posts.post_title: PRICE REDUCED--FS: T206 HOFer "Wee" WILLIE KEELER PORTRAIT (SC 150) SGC 40 VG3
posts.post_content:
Offering for your Fine Collection this wonderful example of NY Highlander Hall of Famer "Wee" Willie Keeler Portrait.

Perfectly clear focus, very clean w/ no green blemishes & nice white borders!

This is also from the Roy Mellinger Collection:
[url]http://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=118774&highlight=Ray+Mellinger[/url]

Add this beauty to your HOF collection---You'll be glad you did!

$289 delivered w/ Sig Con included--Regular PayPal, MO or Personal check all OK. 

Thanks for your time!

Price reduced thru Mon 29th to $275. 

Treat yourself w/ this HOFer!!
Last day to grab this "sweet Willie" card for $275! It's a very nice one---You won't be disappointed, for sure!
